tool_description: The gifs.com API makes it dead simple to convert and transcode a vast array of media into our HTML5 optimized gifs.com player, a compressed .gif, .webm and .mp4.
name: Gifs
title: Gifs

api_list.name: importMedia
api_list.description: Gifs support importing the following file mime types: image/gif, video/mp4, video/webm and you can also link directly to a giphy, imgur, gfycat, streamable, instagram, twitter, facebook, or vine web page and we'll automagically find the best quality file to import.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: The source URL of the media to add

optional_parameters.name: attributionUser
optional_parameters.description: Required if isset attributionSite. The username for social media sites

optional_parameters.name: attributionSite
optional_parameters.description: twitter, reddit, instagram, vine, or a custom URL

optional_parameters.name: attributionUrl
optional_parameters.description: The url if site != social media

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: The tags relating the the media

api_list.name: uploadMedia
api_list.description: You can upload image/gif, video/mp4, and video/webm media.

optional_parameters.name: attribution_url
optional_parameters.description: The url if site != social media

optional_parameters.name: attribution_site
optional_parameters.description: twitter, reddit, instagram, vine, or a custom URL

optional_parameters.name: attribution_user
optional_parameters.description: Required if isset attributionSite. The username for social media sites

optional_parameters.name: nsfw
optional_parameters.description: If the media is not safe for work

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: The tags relating the the media
